Description: Create a whirlwind of mist to obscure vision and disorient enemies.
Summon a breeze that carries water, dousing flames and cooling the area.
Summon a spout of water carried by the wind to drench enemies.
Release a gust of wind carrying freezing water to chill enemies.
Create a vortex of wind and ice that freezes everything it touches.
Summon a cyclone of water that engulfs and drowns enemies.
Release a gale of wind carrying shards of ice to slice enemies.
Summon a vortex shaped like a dragon made of wind and water.
Call down a monsoon carried by the wind to drench and batter enemies.
Create a hurricane that carries water, flooding and drowning the area.
Summon a storm of wind and ice that freezes the battlefield.
Create a tidal wave carried by the wind, sweeping away enemies.
Summon a dragon made of wind and frost to attack your enemies.
Summon a twister filled with water to trap and drown foes.
Create a tempest filled with ice and wind that chills and slices through enemies.
Summon a cyclonic tide that sweeps through the battlefield, drenching and chilling all in its path.
Release a gale of wind so cold it freezes everything in its path.
Create a tsunami carried by the wind to devastate the battlefield.
Unleash the wrath of wind and ice, freezing the battlefield entirely.
Summon the breath of the ocean and sky to bring forth the ultimate storm.
